title: cudnn problem?
body_html:
usr/local/cuda

when i run my code, i have following problem:
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/s/tool/pycharm/pycharm-2016.3/helpers/pydev/pydevd.py", line 1596, in
globals = debugger.run(setup['file'], None, None, is_module)
File "/home/s/tool/pycharm/pycharm-2016.3/helpers/pydev/pydevd.py", line 974, in run
pydev_imports.execfile(file, globals, locals) # execute the script
File "/home/s/myproject/brats-master/src/main.py", line 232, in
main()
File "/home/s/myproject/brats-master/src/main.py", line 116, in main
train_loss = train(train_loader, model, criterion, optimizer, epoch)
File "/home/s/myproject/brats-master/src/main.py", line 152, in train
output = model((x1, x2)) # nx5x9x9x9
File "/home/s/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 202, in call
result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
File "/home/s/myproject/brats-master/src/model.py", line 41, in forward
x1 = self.branch1(x1)
File "/home/s/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 202, in call
result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
File "/home/s/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/container.py", line 64, in forward
input = module(input)
File "/home/s/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 202, in call
result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
File "/home/s/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/container.py", line 64, in forward
input = module(input)
File "/home/s/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/module.py", line 202, in call
result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
File "/home/s/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/modules/conv.py", line 330, in forward
self.padding, self.dilation, self.groups)
File "/home/s/anaconda2/lib/python2.7/site-packages/torch/nn/functional.py", line 88, in conv3d
return f(input, weight, bias)
RuntimeError: CUDNN_STATUS_BAD_PARAM

body:
usr/local/cuda

**when i run my code, i have following problem:**
Traceback (most recent call last):
File "/home/s/tool/pycharm/pycharm-2016.3/helpers/pydev/pydevd.py", line 1596, in

train_loss = train(train_loader, model, criterion, optimizer, epoch)

result = self.forward(*input, **kwargs)
File "/home/s/myproject/brats-master/src/model.py", line 41, in forward
x1 = self.branch1(x1)
